name: Gecko Robotics
headline: AI + Robotics for the Built World
description: Gecko Robotics is the pioneer of AI + Robotics [AIR technology], transforming how the world builds, operates, and maintains its most critical infrastructure for a more reliable and sustainable future. Using fixed sensors and robots that climb, crawl, swim, and fly, we combine first-order data layers with the predictive power of AI into a single source of truth for the physical world. Cantilever™ is our operating platform, powered by AIR technology, that empowers teams to achieve operational excellence through actionable data for immediate and long-term planning.

founders.name: Jake Loosararian, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Gecko Robotics

## This website uses cookies
We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. 
Consent Selection
**Necessary**
**Preferences**
**Statistics**
**Marketing**
[Show details](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)
  * Necessary  9
Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
    * [Cookiebot1](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/www.cookiebot.com/goto/privacy-policy/> "Cookiebot's privacy policy")
**1.gif** Used to count the number of sessions to the website, necessary for optimizing CMP product delivery. 
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : Pixel Tracker
    * [Google2](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/business.safety.google/privacy/> "Google's privacy policy")
Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.
**test_cookie** Pending
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**ar_debug** Checks whether a technical debugger-cookie is present. 
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 3 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie
    * [LinkedIn2](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy> "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
**bcookie** Pending
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**li_gc** Pending
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 180 days**Type** : HTTP Cookie
    * [Vimeo2](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/vimeo.com/privacy> "Vimeo's privacy policy")
**__cf_bm** The __cf_bm cookie supports Cloudflare Bot Management by managing incoming traffic that matches criteria associated with bots. The cookie does not collect any personal data, and any information collected is subject to one-way encryption.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**_cfuvid** Used by Cloudflare WAF to distinguish individual users who share the same IP address and apply rate limits
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie
    * [go.geckorobotics.comconsent.cookiebot.com2](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)
**CookieConsent [x2]** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie
  * Preferences  1
Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.
    * [LinkedIn1](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy> "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
**lidc** Pending
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie
  * Statistics  0
Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
We do not use cookies of this type.
  * Marketing  10
Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.
    * [ Meta Platforms, Inc.3](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/policy.php/> " Meta Platforms, Inc.'s privacy policy")
**lastExternalReferrer** Detects how the user reached the website by registering their last URL-address.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Persistent**Type** : HTML Local Storage
**lastExternalReferrerTime** Detects how the user reached the website by registering their last URL-address.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Persistent**Type** : HTML Local Storage
**_fbp** Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 3 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie
    * [Google6](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)[Learn more about this provider![](https://www.geckorobotics.com)](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/business.safety.google/privacy/> "Google's privacy policy")
Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.
**_ga** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**_ga_#** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**_gat** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**_gcl_au** Used by Google AdSense for experimenting with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services. 
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 3 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**_gid** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie
**collect** Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behavior. Tracks the visitor across devices and marketing channels.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : Pixel Tracker
    * [go.geckorobotics.com1](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<#>)
**pardot** A session cookie named pardot is set in your browser while you’re logged in as a user or when a visitor accesses a form, landing page, or page with Account Engagement tracking code. The cookie denotes an active session and isn’t used for tracking.
**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie
  * Unclassified 0
Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.
We do not use cookies of this type.

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy. Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.
**Do not sell or share my personal information**

[Log In](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/cantilever.app>)
[Contact](https://www.geckorobotics.com/</contact/>)
##  AI + Roboticsfor the Built World 
[ Learn More About AIR ](https://www.geckorobotics.com/</air/>)
##  Build. Operate. Maintain. 
**AI and Robotics are transforming how the world builds, operates, and maintains its most critical infrastructure for a more reliable and sustainable future.** Gecko uses fixed sensors and robots that climb, crawl, swim, and fly to build first-order data layers on the physical world. We combine those data layers with the predictive power of AI into a single source of truth for the physical world.
[ Software Demo ](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/www.geckorobotics.com/resources/videos/demo-video-how-to-optimize-capital-allocation-in-cantilever>)
##  Our Solution: Cantilever® 
Turn Insights into Impact
Cantilever, our operating platform powered by AIR technology, empowers teams to achieve operational excellence through actionable data for immediate and long-term planning.
**Improve operations. Optimize capital outlay. Extend asset life.**
[ Learn More ](https://www.geckorobotics.com/</cantilever/>)[ Log In ](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/cantilever.app>)
Industries
## Your Trusted Partner
10+ Years Experience. Thousands of Assets Analyzed.
Across essential industries, Gecko technology uncovers unprecedented visibility into asset health for confident decision making at scale.

Steve Friend
American Bituminous Power

to Robots, AI to Extend Vessel Health and Maintenance **FOX NEWS** The U.S. military will look to robotics and artificial intelligence (AI) to improve fleet maintenance and readiness. machine-learning algorithms. ](https://www.geckorobotics.com/<https:/im-mining.com/2024/10/04/freeport-to-introduce-gecko-robots-to-power-ai-inputs-at-operations/>) [ ![AXIOS: Exclusive: Gecko Robotics to Expand Its U.S. Navy ##  AI + Roboticsfor the Built World 
 Learn More About AIR ⟨8⟩
##  Build. Operate. Maintain. 
**AI and Robotics are transforming how the world builds, operates, and maintains its most critical infrastructure for a more reliable and sustainable future.** Gecko uses fixed sensors and robots that climb, crawl, swim, and fly to build first-order data layers on the physical world. We combine those data layers with the predictive power of AI into a single source of truth for the physical world.
 Software Demo ⟨18⟩
##  Our Solution: Cantilever® 
Turn Insights into Impact
Cantilever, our operating platform powered by AIR technology, empowers teams to achieve operational excellence through actionable data for immediate and long-term planning.
**Improve operations. Optimize capital outlay. Extend asset life.**
 Learn More ⟨7⟩ Log In ⟨16⟩

## Your Trusted Partner
10+ Years Experience. Thousands of Assets Analyzed.
Across essential industries, Gecko technology uncovers unprecedented visibility into asset health for confident decision making at scale.

generated_description:
Gecko Robotics is a pioneering company founded in 2016, headquartered in Pittsburgh, PA, and part of Y Combinator's W16 batch. They are on a mission to revolutionize the built environment through their focus on AI and robotics, encapsulated in their AIR (AI + Robotics) technology. This technology is designed to transform how critical infrastructure is built, operated, and maintained, ultimately aiming for a more sustainable future.

At the heart of their offerings is the Cantilever™ platform. Think of Cantilever as the nerve center that combines powerful AI with real-time data collected through advanced, mobile robots that can climb, crawl, swim, and fly. This robust fusion of data types allows organizations to gain unparalleled insights into their assets' health, enabling immediate operational improvements and long-term planning.

With a growing team of around 230 employees, Gecko Robotics serves several vital industries including energy, manufacturing, and defense. Their strategic partnerships span various key players like the U.S. Navy, Siemens, and Marathon Oil, reinforcing their position within the market.

Gecko Robotics positions itself as a trusted partner, aiming to improve operations, extend asset life, optimize capital investments, and reduce unexpected failures—essentially making industries smarter and more resilient. Their vision is to harness cutting-edge technology for not just operational excellence but a proactive and predictive approach to infrastructure management.

If you're interested in exploring what they do further, take a look at their website: [Gecko Robotics](https://www.geckorobotics.com).
